name: Inindo: Way of the Ninja
overview: You're a young ninja hungry for adventure and revenge. Travel on foot or by boat to famous training grounds where you will learn Ninjutsu, the secret art of stealth fighting! Use your trusty sword, throwing stars or even magic spells against vicious monsters inside Japan's treacherous dungeons. As spying and sabotage are your expertise, infiltrate castles to gather information and then set them ablaze! Soon, you'll be powerful enough to lead your own army against enemy warlords. In the end, you must seek revenge on Nobunaga, the powerful ruler who destroyed your home village in his ruthless quest to become Shogun. Times are tough, but remember, you are a ninja and anything is possible.
